questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A busy city street
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A building
C) The sunset or sunrise and a empty paved road
D) An animal

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) The sun setting or rising and a paved road
D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Tall buildings
B) Mountains
C) Open fields and trees
D) The ocean

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A busy street
B) A rural road
C) A beach
D) A paved road

What can be seen on either side of the road?
A) Skyscrapers
B) Farmland and power lines
C) Ocean waves
D) Desert dunes

What is the weather like in the photo?
A) Rainy
B) Cloudy
C) Clear
D) Snowy

What type of road is shown in the photo?
A) A highway
B) A city street
C) A dirt path
D) A residential street

What is the state of the road in the photo?
A) Paved and smooth
B) Rocky and uneven
C) Covered in snow
D) Flooded

What kind of vegetation is visible in the photo?
A) Tropical plants
B) Desert cacti
C) Grass and trees
D) Snow-covered pines

How many lanes does the road have?
A) One lane
B) Two lanes
C) Four lanes
D) Six lanes

What is the color of the sky in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Gray
C) Yellowish-orange
D) Dark black

What is the position of the sun in the photo?
A) High in the sky
B) Just above the horizon
C) Hidden behind clouds
D) Directly overhead

Are there any vehicles visible in the photo?
A) Yes, many vehicles
B) No, none
C) Yes, a few vehicles
D) Only one vehicle

What kind of power lines are visible in the photo?
A) High-voltage transmission lines
B) Telephone lines
C) Streetcar lines
D) None

What is the mood of the photo?
A) Chaotic
B) Peaceful
C) Tense
D) Exciting

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) From above
B) From the side
C) From the road
D) From behind

Are there any buildings visible in the photo?
A) Yes, many buildings
B) No, none
C) Yes, a few buildings
D) Only one building

Is there any water visible in the photo?
A) Yes, a river
B) Yes, a lake
C) Yes, a pond
D) No, there is no water

What is the condition of the grass in the photo?
A) Brown and dry
B) Green and healthy
C) Covered in snow
D) Burnt

What can be inferred about the traffic on the road?
A) Heavy traffic
B) Light traffic
C) Moderate traffic
D) No traffic

What is the direction of the road in the photo?
A) Curving
B) Straight
C) Zigzagging
D) Circular

Are there any signs visible in the photo?
A) Yes, many signs
B) No, none
C) Yes, a few signs
D) Only one sign

How does the photo make you feel?
A) Anxious
B) Calm
C) Excited
D) Sad

What is the width of the road in the photo?
A) Narrow
B) Wide
C) Very narrow
D) Very wide

What is the condition of the sky in the photo?
A) Overcast
B) Clear with a sunset or sunrise
C) Stormy
D) Snowy

How many power poles are visible in the photo?
A) None
B) A few
C) Many
D) Only one

What is the lighting like in the photo?
A) Bright daylight
B) Soft sunset or sunrise light
C) Artificial lighting
D) Dark and shadowy

What is the horizon like in the photo?
A) Sharp and clear
B) Blurry and indistinct
C) Hidden by buildings
D) Covered in trees

What is the overall composition of the photo?
A) Symmetrical
B) Asymmetrical
C) Crowded
D) Minimalistic

What kind of activity is depicted in the photo?
A) A busy market
B) A quiet road
C) A sports event
D) A concert

What is the texture of the road in the photo?
A) Rough and gravelly
B) Smooth and paved
C) Sandy
D) Muddy

What is the angle of the photo?
A) High angle
B) Low angle
C) Eye level
D) Bird's eye view

What kind of landscape is visible in the photo?
A) Mountainous
B) Coastal
C) Flat and open
D) Forested

What is the distance to the horizon in the photo?
A) Very close
B) Moderate distance
C) Very far
D) Indistinct

What kind of lines are dominant in the photo?
A) Vertical lines
B) Horizontal lines
C) Diagonal lines
D) Curved lines

What is the overall tone of the photo?
A) Vibrant and colorful
B) Dark and moody
C) Warm and serene
D) Cold and stark
